entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
